title: Murder by Lime
description: *This is book 4 in the Key West Culinary Cozy Series*What do you do when life hands you limes? You have a choice. Make lime-ade or find out who killed the smuggler who just sold you a shipment of illegal green fruit? Marilyn's Key Lime Pie shop is ready to do its best business ever, but until she finds a way to resupply her ingredients, the ships full of tourists are likely to go elsewhere. The contraband crime goes from bad to worse, and now Marilyn must clear herself of suspicion before her dreams turn into pie in the sky.Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the Book 1: Book 2: Book 3:
author: Summer Prescott
